overview: An orphan, Sarthak, is raised by a couple. As he grows up, Sarthak, along with two friends, raises awareness about serving parents across India and launches a massive campaign to celebrate February 14th as "Parents' Day." He meets with ministers, chief ministers, and officials to gain national recognition for this day.
title: Trailer - Tere Ghar Me Ganga Behti Hai

overview: A sharp clash between political power and spiritual wisdom. This trailer uncovers hidden motives, rising tensions, and the battle between worldly ambition and true Brahmgyan. A thought-provoking glimpse into truth, manipulation, and awakening.
title: Politics, Politicians & Spiritual Wisdom

overview: A gripping look at the conflict between traditional beliefs, humanity, and the ideology of the Brahma Kumaris. This teaser explores hidden truths, rising tensions, and the search for real spiritual clarity.
title: Monasteries, Humanity & Brahma Kumaris
